io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.interfaces

Interface EventListener


  • public interface EventListener
    EventListener provides developer events about connection and real-time action of other people in the chatroom to listen. You could use this by put this in ChatroomManager.connect(String, Identity, boolean).

    All of these events would be invoked on UI thread.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnected

        void onConnected()
        Called when a connection to a chatroom succeeded.

      • onConnectFailed

        void onConnectFailed(Exception error)
        Called when a connection to a chatroom failed.
        Parameters:
        error - Failure reason.

      • onError

        void onError(Exception error)
        Called when a error occurred. When you receive this event, it means the connection was shut down.
        Parameters:
        error - Error that occurs when ChatroomManager tries to reconnect.

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected()
        Called when a connection was shut down successfully by invoking ChatroomManager.disconnect()

      • onMessageAdded

        void onMessageAdded(Message message)
        Called when a new message was added to the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        message - The message.

      • onMessageRemoved

        void onMessageRemoved(String messageId)
        Called when a message was removed from the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The message id.

      • onMessageFlushed

        void onMessageFlushed()
        Called when the messages in the chatroom was flushed by Master.

      • onAggregatedDataAdded

        void onAggregatedDataAdded(SimpleArrayMap<String,Integer> map)
        Called when some aggregated data was added to the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        map - each key-value pair represents the number of times the data string has occurred

      • onRawDataAdded

        void onRawDataAdded(Message message)
        Called when a new raw data message was added to the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        message - The raw data which someone sent via sendRawData(RawData), use Message.getRawData() to retrieve the RawData.

      • onUserJoined

        void onUserJoined(User... users)
        Called when a user/users joined the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        users - Users who joined the chatroom.

      • onUserUpdated

        void onUserUpdated(User... users)
        Called when information of a user/users is updated.
        Parameters:
        users - New information of users.

      • onUserLeft

        void onUserLeft(Integer... userLabels)
        Called when a user/users leaved the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        userLabels - Label of left users.

      • userCount

        void userCount(int userCount)
        Sent from the server to provide current user count in chatroom. This method is invoked periodically and when user count changes.
        Parameters:
        userCount - Current user count in chatroom.

      • onChatWriteModeChanged

        void onChatWriteModeChanged(ChatMode chatMode)
        Called when the ChatMode of current chatroom changed.
        Parameters:
        chatMode - New ChatMode.

      • onInputIntervalChanged

        void onInputIntervalChanged(int inputInterval)
        Called when the message-send interval of current chatroom changed.
        Parameters:
        inputInterval - New message-send interval.

      • onPinnedMessageUpdated

        void onPinnedMessageUpdated(@Nullable
                            Message pinnedMessage)
        Called when the pinned message is updated or unpinned.
        Parameters:
        pinnedMessage - the pinned message, will be null if it is unpinned
        See Also:
        ChatroomManager.pinMessage(Message), ChatroomManager.unpinMessage(), ChatroomManager.getPinnedMessage()

      • onMetadataUpdated

        void onMetadataUpdated(SimpleArrayMap<String,ChatMetadata> map)
        Called when ChatMetadata are updated. See Chat Metadata.
        Parameters:
        map - the updated meta data.
        See Also:
        ChatroomManager.setMetadata(String, Object, boolean), ChatMetadata
